author: Jorge Luis Pagan
comment: It's too light. It looks more grayish than black. The indicators are not very accurate and even confusing.
title: Nice watch face..... But

author: Christopher Como
comment: I have reset both my phone and watch multiple times, and resynced Wear Apps to watch but it is still not listed in my watch face list. Uninstalling.

reply.author: Orbit Watches
reply.content: We are very sorry you are experiencing this issue, unfortunately this is a common issue with android wear, the upload speed to the watch is VERY slow due to the Bluetooth LE connection. That and these watch faces are slightly larger in terms of file size. It could take a few minutes for the transfer to complete.

title: Doesn't work on Moto360

author: Alan Johnston
comment: Installed on moto 360 but it doesn't fill the face properly and looks like it's slipped from top to bottom!
title: Disappointed

author: David Taroyan
comment: I have the new Urbane and this has to be the worst resolution WatchFace I've ever seen
title: Resolution

author: Derek Tishler
comment: Easily my new favorite watch face. Cant beat the look and the multiple dials.
title: Just wow.

author: Ryan Joseph
comment: The watch face itself looks great and works well. But ambient mode is really boring and ugly.
title: Ambient mode is terrible
